nodes.text: The sun of the planet Nathema was a star located in the Nathema system, a star system in the Outer Rim Territories's Chorlian sector. In 3954 BBY, the star was a bright orange color, though it appeared to be a pale brown from the surface of Nathema due to the effects of the Sith Lord Vitiate's Force ritual over a thousand years earlier.

Nathema's sun was first mentioned in Drew Karpyshyn's 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, when the Sith Scourge realizes another effect of the Emperor's ritual while on the surface of the planet. In 2016, an expansion for the massively multiplayer online roleplaying game Star Wars: The Old Republic, titled Knights of the Eternal Throne, provided the first visual depiction of the star.
